Welcome to Kerala – God's Own Country

Explore the land of coconut groves, backwaters, and culture!


Kerala is known for its serene backwaters, lush hill stations, Ayurvedic retreats, and colorful festivals. It’s a unique blend of tradition, nature, and hospitality.

Plan your journey to the greenest paradise in India!

Quick Facts

  • Population: 35 million
  • Language: Malayalam
  • Currency: Indian Rupee (₹)
  • Time Zone: GMT +5:30

Top Attractions

  1. Alleppey Backwaters
  2. Munnar Tea Gardens
  3. Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary
  4. Varkala Beach
  5. Padmanabhaswamy Temple

Best Months to Visit Kerala

Month Weather Activities
September - November Pleasant & Green Backwaters, Houseboats
December - February Cool & Dry Trekking, Festivals
March - May Warm Summer Beach Time, Ayurveda

Plan your trip to Kerala now! Boat stays, spice tours, and natural therapy await!
